description: HELM monomer JSON Schema draft v1

symbol.description: Short name for the monomer. This will be displayed on the canvas.

name.description: Long name for the monomer. Generally an IUPAC or commonly used trivial chemical name.

author.description: Name of the person who entered the monomer information.

id.description: Unique ID for the monomer. There is no meaning associated with this ID value.

rgroups.description: An array of the monomer R groups and required information.

id.description: meaningless identifier for the r group

alternateId.description: Descriptive ID for the R group consisting of the label and R group plus number

label.description: R followed by an integer denoting the R group number

capGroupName.description: A list of the atoms in the leaving group. This is descriptive, and exists to show the user the leaving group atoms

capGroupSMILES.description: SMILES of the R group, uses atom mapping notation

smiles.description: Canonical SMILES of the monomer including connection points.

polymerType.description: Type must be one of a fixed list of agreed polymer types.

naturalAnalog.description: Natural analogue of the monomer where available.

monomerType.description: Type of monomer from a fixed list of agreed monomer types.
